title: Problems with the official league app
body:
the app logs you out from the pc client saying its been logged on from somewhere else.
and the most annoying thing is that most it also happens during champ select.
really unfair from my point of view. and also how can i fix this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I've just tested and the official app doesn't seem to log me out of the game client, I'm fairly sure that message only appears when you log in from another computer.

It's possible your account may have been compromised in one way or another, please ensure your [computer is secure](https://www.malwarebytes.org/) and that you change all relevant passwords (Email, league account, etc).

If you're still sure it's the league friends app causing your problems, simply disconnecting your mobile device from the internet should resolve the issue.
